import React from "react"; import styles from "./Card.module.css"; import Wrap from "../Wrap/Wrap"; import settingsSign from "../images/other/settings.png"; import map from '../images/card/map.png' import chip from '../images/card/chip.png' import visa from '../images/card/visa.png' const Body = () => { return (

 ); }; export default Body;
